name: DeleteDatastoreItem
description:
Delete an item from a datastore by its key.

Use this tool to delete a specific item from a datastore when you have the key and datastore ID.

parameters.name: datastore_id
parameters.description: A string representing the unique identifier of the datastore from which the item will be deleted.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the datastore to retrieve.

parameters.name: item_unique_identifier
parameters.description: Optional unique identifier of the item to delete. Use if available for more precise deletion.

value_schema.description: Optional unique identifier of the item to delete.

parameters.name: item_primary_key
parameters.description: The primary key value identifying the item to delete. Max length is 256 characters.

value_schema.description: The primary key value that identifies the item to delete. Cannot exceed 256 characters.

parameters.name: resource_type_for_datastore_items
parameters.description: The resource type for datastore items. Must be 'items'.

value_schema.description: The resource type for datastore items.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: datastore_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the datastore to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the datastore to retrieve.

parameters.name: data.attributes.id
parameters.description: Optional unique identifier of the item to delete.

value_schema.description: Optional unique identifier of the item to delete.

parameters.name: data.attributes.item_key
parameters.description: The primary key value that identifies the item to delete. Cannot exceed 256 characters.

value_schema.description: The primary key value that identifies the item to delete. Cannot exceed 256 characters.

parameters.name: data.type
parameters.description: The resource type for datastore items.

value_schema.description: The resource type for datastore items.
